alert.note: Alert for Rockingham; Stokes (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:12PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Stokes and southwestern Rockingham Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 312 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pine Hall, or near Walnut Cove, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wentworth... Mayodan... Madison... Walnut Cove... Pine Hall... Intelligence... and Germanton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
